issue.title: [C++] Bump version of bundled rapidjson

rapidjson hasn't made any releases in a very long time, but we could move to a newer vendored changeset (the current changeset we vendor, 1a803826f1197b5e30703afe4b9c0e7dd48074f5, is from May 2020).
